        public void createPage(String pageName,
                       String parentPath,
                       String template,
                       String url,
                       String user,
                       String pass)
        Uses the CQ WCMCommands to create a page using a POST action
        Parameters:
        pageName - The name of the page that will be created
        parentPath - The path of the parent page to create under
        template - The AEM template that will be used for the page
        env - The environment settings to use
